error.current: The date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The date of birth is required.

check-again: To check the status of another application, click the button below:
description: Fill in the fields below to check the status of your passport application. Make sure your information matches your passport application form.

1.label: Being processed
1.description: Your application has been received and is in progress. If any further information is required, we will contact you.

2.label: Issued and Ready for Pickup
2.description: Your passport will be issued and ready for pick-up on your scheduled pick-up date. You must wait until your scheduled pick-up date to pick up your passport. Your passport pick-up date will show on your pick-up receipt.

3.label: Issued and Shipping Canada Post
3.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using Canada Post. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
3.tracking: You can track this shipment on Canada Post's website using the tracking code:

4.label: Issued and Shipping Fedex
4.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using FedEx. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
4.tracking: You can track this shipment on FedEx's website using the tracking code:

5.label: Not acceptable for processing
5.description: We reviewed your application and you will receive further communication by mail or by phone from the Passport Program.

99.label: Application No Longer Meets Criteria for Use
99.description: If you're seeing this then something has gone wrong.

status-is: The latest status of your application according to our records is:
unable-to-find-status: We are unable to determine the status of your application at this time using this service.
no-match-title: Other ways to get your status:

cannot-provide-result.title: We cannot provide a result at this time because:
cannot-provide-result.reason1: the information you provided does not match the information in our system;
cannot-provide-result.reason2: we have not yet received your application; or
cannot-provide-result.reason3: we have received your application but have not yet started processing it.

please-verify: Please verify the information entered and try again.
please-wait: If you have not waited at least (insert amount of time/full service standard), please try again at a later date/time.

still-unable.if-still-unable: If you are still unable to retrieve your status, you may:
still-unable.contact-call-center: Contact the Passport Call Centre (insert phone #).
still-unable.visit-in-person: Visit an in-person Service Canada Centre nearest you (link to FSCO)

cannot-give-status.description: We can't give you your application status right now because:

list.item-1: the information you gave us doesn't match the information in our system or
list.item-2: we received your application, but haven't started processing it yet

available-after.description: The status of your application is available after:

list.item-1: 5 days if you applied in person or
list.item-2: 10 days if you applied by mail

no-record.double-check: Double check your information and try again. If your application still can't be found, you can try again tomorrow. Our records update daily.

being-processed.received: We've received your application and have started processing it.
being-processed.we-will-contact: If we need any further information, we'll contact you by email or telephone. Service Canada will not use text messages or instant messages to start a conversation with you about your passport application.

ready-for-pickup.has-been-printed: The passport has been printed. Check your receipt to confirm when and where to pick up the passport.
ready-for-pickup.do-not-visit: Do not visit the pickup location before the date printed on your receipt.

shipped-canada-post.printed-and-mailing: The passport has been printed. We're mailing it to you via Canada Post.
shipped-canada-post.supporting-documents: We may send your supporting documents back separately.
shipped-canada-post.did-not-receive: If you don't receive your documents within 4 weeks of receiving your passport, you can call us at

shipped-fedex.printed-and-mailing: The passport has been printed. We're mailing it to you via Fedex.
shipped-fedex.supporting-documents: You'll receive your passport and supporting documents in the same envelope.

not-acceptable.cannot-process: We have reviewed your application and can't process it further.
not-acceptable.explanation: We're sending you a letter explaining why, as well as your supporting documents. You should get these within the next few weeks.

status-check-numerous-attempts.description: If after numerous attempts you are unable to access the status of your application online, or if your application is taking longer than the

status-check-urgent.description: If you need a passport within 10 business days, learn

express-services.text: how to get urgent or express passport services.

link.text: You can track the package online.

header-messages.fill-in-field: Fill in the fields below to check the status of your passport application.
header-messages.matches: Make sure your information matches your passport application form.
header-messages.for-child: For child applications, use the child's given name(s) and surname exactly as provided on their passport application.
header-messages.passport-officer: When entering the application into our system, the passport officer may have updated information in the application to match the information provided on the proof of citizenship or supporting identification. This may differ from preferred information for you or your child.

receipt-image-1.title: Example Receipt 1:
receipt-image-1.description-alt: File Number (circled in red on image) located on centre of an "Official Receipt" below date/time

receipt-image-2.title: Example Receipt 2:
receipt-image-2.description-alt: File Number (circled in red on image) located close to the top of an "Official Receipt and Pick-up Slip" below the applicant's name
